attributes.action: Have Steve McClaren Sacked from his job as England manager and deported from the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please Mr Brown get involved and force the F.A to have stupid face McClaren sacked and then deport him far far away before he does anymore harm to our great country’s football reputation!?! 

We are a laughing stock in europe and the world through is stupidness. 

After all it was this country that invented the game in the first place!!!

I know you are not having a great time at the minute with those pesky tories spoiling your party, but doing the right thing with this issue would win you an election!! forget all the other policies this one is serious!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
